sections.description: Accurate stock logging for WooCommerce products with advanced filtering capabilities. Track all stock changes including manual edits, orders, restorations, and REST API updates. Filter by product ID, SKU, name, date range, and change type. Fully WPCS compliant.
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/anony-stock-log/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  3. Ensure WooCommerce is installed and active
  4. Navigate to WooCommerce â†’ Stock Log to view logs

sections.faq:
How does the plugin work?

The plugin automatically tracks all stock changes in WooCommerce products and stores detailed information including old stock, new stock, change type, user information, and optional hook location tracking.

Does it affect performance?

The plugin is optimized for performance. Hook location tracking is disabled by default and can be enabled from the settings page if needed for debugging purposes.
